mapper.select: select * from (select rownum as rnum, n.*from (select notice_no as noticeNo, notice_writer as noticeWriter, notice_title as noticeTitle, enroll_date as enrollDate from notice order by 1 desc)n) where rnum between #{start} and #{end}
select notice_no as noticeNo, notice_title as noticeTitle, notice_writer as noticeWriter, notice_content as noticeContent, enroll_date as enrollDate from notice where notice_no=#{_parameter}
